text:
e="preserve">Adam Hollingsworth (also known as Dreadhead Cowboy, born circa 1987) is an American equestrian. He participated in Black Lives Matter marches in Chicago. He supported census taking in the city.
Life.
He was born in Woodlawn, Chicago. He grew up on the East Side of Chicago. From 2010 to 2020, he was an exotic dancer.
He boards his horses at his uncle's horse farm. He has been harassed.
